0.1.name: wordpress/phpcodezcategories
0.1.description:
PHPCodez Categories lists the categories. The output can be managed from the back end

Features

1) We can restrict the number of categories

2) We can list the post count along with the category name .

3) We can sort the categories based on name, number of posts or id in ascending/descending oreder

4) We can list only root categories . Note : It will display only root categories and its first level sub categories

5) We can exclude categories if needed
